string.name: wp_checklist_tutorial_overview
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the patient to the checklist activity. %%CHECKLIST is replaced with the name of the activity.

resources.string: %%CHECKLIST shows you steps that your care team is taking to get you ready to leave the hospital.

string.name: wp_checklist_tutorial_overview_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the patient proxy to the checklist activity %%CHECKLIST is replaced with the name of the activity.

resources.string: %%CHECKLIST shows you steps that %%PATNAME\'s care team is taking to get %%PATNAME ready to leave the hospital.
